item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Esu's Heirloom] Info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Boots] Esu’s Heirloom link 925 Item Power 462 Armor Evade Grants +125% Movement Speed for 3 Second +[12.5 - 18.0]% Movement Speed +[8.0 - 12.5]% Movement Speed for 7 Seconds After Killing an Elite +[57.0 - 75.0]% Critical Strike Damage +[8.0 - 10.0]% Resistance to All Elements Requires Level: 80 Your Critical Strike Chance is increased by [20 - 40]% of your Movement Speed bonus. Current Bonus: [3.3 - 6.

item.title: [Diablo 4] Ancestral Unique Item [Yen's Blessing] info
item.description: [Ancestral Unique Boots] Yen’s Blessing link 925 Item Power 462 Armor +3 Maximum Evade Charges +[28 - 42] All Stats +[12.5 - 18.0]% Movement Speed +[26.0 - 35.0]% Resistance to All Elements [8.5 - 12.0]% Resource Generation Requires Level: 74 Casting a Skill has a [40 - 60]% chance to cast a Non-Mobility, Non-Ultimate Skill that is currently on Cooldown. Can only occur once every 8 seconds. These greaves are imbued with the divine blessing of Yen, the Veradani goddes of restoration.
